content: **drops crochet slippers in snow** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **size ** eu 35/37 - 38/40 42/44 us 5/6½ - 7½/9 - 10/12 uk 3/4 - 5/6½ - 7½/9½ foot length 22 - 25 - 28 cm / 8 ¾ -9 ¾ -11 **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 150-200-200 g color no 21 jeans blue drops crochet hook size 8 mm / us l/11 - or size needed to obtain the correct crochet gauge
